sentence.Network_en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentence.Network_cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

sentence.Network_en: Psychological twists perk up an otherwise predictable story line.
sentence.Network_cn: 心理转折使原本老套的故事情节变得生动有趣。

sentence.Network_en: Don't be mean with fabric, otherwise curtains will end up looking skimpy.
sentence.Network_cn: 别这么吝啬布料，不然做出来的窗帘会显得特寒酸。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... likewise 同样地 otherwise 要不然，否则 crabwise 似蟹横行地.
高考英语单词绝妙记忆法 - 豆丁网 ... original a. 最初的；新颖的n.创新 otherwise ad. 另外，要不然 ought aux. 应该.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... likewise 同样地 otherwise 要不然，否则 crabwise 似蟹横行地.
电脑发音：otherwise 别 , 别的方式 , 不然 , 不然的话 , 否则 , 其他方面 , 要不 , 要不然 , 在不同状态specified 指定

list.abs: print and on - line assumed unless otherwise noted with order ., 打印和在线假定除非另有说明与秩序.
work hard , otherwise you will be sorry ., 努力工作 , 否则你回后悔.
He danced howled , raved , and otherwise disturbed the welkin ., 他又跳 , 又吼 , 又叫 , 使尽各种伎俩来搅扰这苍穹.

and , of , the signature must appear in legitimate programs , otherwise people may find their expensive programs being attacked and destroyed by the antivirus software .而且，要保证合法的程序里没有此段编码，否则人们会发现重要的程序会受到杀毒软件的攻击并被破坏。

jx.jx_en_mean: indicating the opposite of or a contrast to something stated

lj.lj_ly: we don't want a president, elected or otherwise.
lj.lj_ls: 我们不要总统，不管他是否是选举产生的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English on ōthre wisan (see other, wise)

encyclopedia.content: 基本释义 otherwise['ʌeəwaiz] adv.否则；另外；在其他方面 adj. 另外的；其他方面的 词组短语 or otherwise 或相反；或其反面 and otherwise 等等 otherwise than 不像；除…外；与…不同 同近义词 adv.否则；另外；在其他方面 else, extra adj.另外的；其他方面的 another, 网络释义 在其他方面； 别样； 否则； 不然的话 短语Otherwise Than除外；不像 OWlSE otherwise否则 Not Otherwise而不其它；而不别 O

entry.def: You use otherwise after stating a situation or fact, in order to say what the result or consequence would be if this situation or fact was not the case.

example.ex: Make a note of the questions you want to ask. You will invariably forget some of them otherwise...
example.tran: 把想提的问题记下来，否则总是会漏掉其中的一些。

example.ex: I'm lucky that I'm interested in school work, otherwise I'd go mad.
example.tran: 我很庆幸自己对学习怀有兴趣，不然我会疯掉的。

entry.def: You use otherwise before stating the general condition or quality of something, when you are also mentioning an exception to this general condition or quality.

example.ex: The decorations for the games have lent a splash of colour to an otherwise drab city.
example.tran: 为运动会所作的装扮给原本毫无生气的城市增添了一抹亮色。

example.ex: ...a blue and gold caravan, slightly travel-stained but otherwise in good condition.
example.tran: 除了在旅途中弄得有点脏以外，性能良好的蓝金色旅行拖车

entry.def: You use otherwise to refer in a general way to actions or situations that are very different from, or the opposite to, your main statement.

example.ex: Take approximately 60mg up to four times a day, unless advised otherwise by a doctor...
example.tran: 每次服用大约60毫克，每天最多4次，或遵医嘱。

example.ex: There is no way anything would ever happen between us, and believe me I've tried to convince myself otherwise...
example.tran: 相信我，我已经努力试图说服自己我们之间存有希望，但我们真的是绝对不可能的。

entry.tran: 以其他方式；用别的方法
entry.def: You use otherwise to indicate that other ways of doing something are possible in addition to the way already mentioned.

example.ex: The studio could punish its players by keeping them out of work, and otherwise controlling their lives.
example.tran: 电影公司能通过让艺人坐冷板凳来惩罚他们，并采用其他方式控制他们的生活。

entry.tran: 及其他；或相反；或其反面
entry.def: You use or otherwise or and otherwise to mention something that is not the thing just referred to or is the opposite of that thing.

example.ex: It was for the police to assess the validity or otherwise of the evidence...
example.tran: 应该由警方来判定证据有效与否。

example.ex: He didn't want company, talkative or otherwise...
example.tran: 他不想跟人搭伴，不管这个伴儿是否健谈。

means.word_mean: 1. other than as supposed or expected;

auth_sentence.content: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.
auth_sentence.res_content: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.

auth_sentence.content: I'm less nervous than I would be otherwise.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm less nervous than I would be otherwise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm less nervous than I would be otherwise.

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise, we suggest you stick to the soundtrack.
auth_sentence.res_content: Otherwise, we suggest you stick to the soundtrack.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Otherwise, we suggest you stick to the soundtrack.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表副词,"方向,状态",也可表形容词

stems_affixes.word_buile: coast海岸+wise方向,状态→沿着海岸
clock时钟+wise方向,状态→adj.&adv.顺时针方向[的,地]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 末端朝前或向上的[地],向前的[地]
stems_affixes.word_buile: end末端+wise方向,状态→末端朝前的
coast海岸+wise方向,状态→沿着海岸
crab吹毛求疵+wise方向,状态→小心地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 斜地,成十字状地,交叉地
同样地,照样地;又,也,而且
stems_affixes.word_buile: like相象+wise方向,状态→同样地,照样地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 另样,用别的方法;在其他方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: other其他+wise方向,状态→其他方面
side边+wise方向,状态→adv.向一边的,横斜的
other其他+wise方向,状态→其他方面

Sentence.sentence: Nonetheless, the developers of the Chinatown garage are confident with the technology and are counting on it to squeeze 67 cars in an apartment-building basement that would otherwise fit only 24, accomplished by removing a maneuver space normally required.
Some otherwise high-ranking countries had relatively low scores for political representation.
Yeah, otherwise we won't have room for the more.

means.word_mean: 用别的方法, 不同地

sentences.en: He says it's genuine, but we think otherwise.
sentences.cn: 他说这是真的, 但我们不这样认为。

means.word_mean: 在其他方面; 除此以外

sentences.en: The soup was cold, but it was otherwise an excellent meal.
sentences.cn: 除了汤是凉的以外, 那顿饭菜是很好的。

sentences.en: You'd better go now, otherwise you'll miss the train.
sentences.cn: 你最好现在就走, 要不然就赶不上火车了。

jushi.english: He says it's genuine, but we think otherwise.
jushi.chinese: 他说这是真的,但我们不这样认为。

jushi.english: He is rich, but otherwise an unhappy man.
jushi.chinese: 他有钱,但在其他方面却是个不幸的人。

jushi.english: He's naughty, but otherwise a nice boy.
jushi.chinese: 他很调皮,但除此之外他还是个挺不错的男孩子。
